segments.text: I don't know , but he gives me the creeps .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just take it easy . If he starts to bother you , let me know and I'll call security .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But what if he knows my name , where I live ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't get all worked up over him . He's probably harmless .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , he's really good-looking . Too bad he's a weirdo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You never know . Maybe he's just an innocent , lonely guy ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now he's looking over here ! He's coming !
segments.speaker: S1
